SPHXF.summary: SM Prime Holdings, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the property development business in the Philippines, China, and Southeast Asia. The company operates through four segments: Mall, Residential, Commercial, and Hotels and Convention Centers. It develops, conducts, operates, maintains, and rents commercial shopping centers, as well as amusement centers and cinema theaters in the shopping centers. The company also engages in the development and sale of residential units, such as condominium units and leisure homes; development, operations, management, and leasing of commercial units, such as office buildings; and operation and maintenance of hotels and convention centers. As of December 31, 2020, it operated eight hotels with 1,961 rooms; five convention centers; and three trade halls. The company was incorporated in 1994 and is based in Pasay City, the Philippines.
